description:
Gillie and Wallo visit NBA YoungBoy at Grave Digger Mountain where heâ€™s been on house arrest for 2 years. Despite his confinement, he still manages to be on top of the hip hop game and on the minds and hearts of his millions of fans who have taken his career to another level. With over 30 billion streams on YouTube, NBA YoungBoy is one of the most successful rappers of his generation. NBA YoungBoy talks about his life on house arrest and how he copes with loneliness. He also discusses with Gillie and Wallo about what makes them happy at this point in life and their career.

title: NBA YOUNGBOY: MILLION DOLLAZ WORTH OF GAME EPISODE 252
author: MILLION DOLLAZ WORTH OF GAME
